DOC.detailed_description: Induction labor one common obstetrical medical procedure perform today . Iatrogenic stimulation uterine contraction prior onset spontaneous labor undertake various maternal fetal indication span 20 % delivery today 1 . During past year additional rise due elective induction 2 . Induction undertaken potential risk prolong pregnancy outweigh risk induced delivery , particularly associate post-term pregnancy , rupture membrane , oligohydramnios additional fetal maternal condition pose risk mother fetus . In many circumstance woman unfavorable cervix ( Bishop score 7 less ) sequential induction one agent necessary . To date , trial compare optimal subsequent ripen method preliminary use dinoprostone ( prostaglandin E2 ) . In trial investigator aim compare obstetrical outcome subsequent induction woman admit induction labor Bishop score < 7 less 24 hour insertion vaginal prostaglandin insert ( Propess ) . Two method routine induction labor compare : An additional Propess induction another 24 hour vs. intravenous oxytocin infusion combine intra-cervical balloon insertion .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Maternal age 18 year great 2 . Singleton gestation 3 . Bishop score 7 less 24 hour insertion Propess 4 . Pregnancies 36+0/7 week gestation beyond 5 . Normal fetal heart rate tracing normal sonogram admission ( ie Vertex , appropriate gestational age , biophysical score 8/8 , normal amniotic fluid index ) 6 . No contraindication prolongation pregnancy ( e.g . intrauterine infection , placental abruption , etc . ) 1 . Situations prevent continuation induction process arm patient refusal , maternal fetal condition necessitate prompt delivery . 2 . Rupture membrane ( ROM ) initial Propess insertion .
